Text.Page:
I'm ruined! Those kulkari bastards got my cargo, my wagons, and nearly got my hide!

They think they've won, but I still have enough gold to put a bounty on those {@LinkCreature:24#6#Sand Wind kulkari}, {@LinkCreature:24#7#champions}, and {@LinkCreature:24#8#prophets}, and then move on to the {@LinkCreature:24#57#crushers}, {@LinkCreature:24#58#shamans}, and {@LinkCreature:24#156#reavers}.

Kill them all!
Now I feel avenged. I can sleep with some peace of mind. Thanks.
